document_data.name: Harvas Peltsen
document_data.mainbody: '''Harvas Peltsen''' was one of the leaders of [[Teziir]] in [[1359 DR]].
document_data.History:
Harvas was one of the founders of Teziir and sat on the [[Council of Teziir|Teziir City Council]].

In 1359 DR, Harvas knew that a gift from the [[Lords of Waterdeep]] to King [[Azoun Obarskyr IV]] would pass through his city.
